1202784727020777472.full_text:
Jin Maozhi, #NanjingMassacre survivor, passes away at 91, bringing the number of remaining survivors to 78.

Jin witnessed the killing of his father during the massacre, in which more than 300,000 Chinese civilians were killed over six weeks by Japanese troops in 1937. https://t.co/w4bj3iDVdK

1202920674484015104.full_text: Descendant of #NanjingMassacre survivor to hold testimony meeting in Japan https://t.co/iJfAuwrvNI https://t.co/ktTvSiOgUz

1205273818010439680.full_text: Hoy #Nanjing llora y recuerda a las 300.000 victimas de la masacre perpetuada por tropas japonesas en 1937. La ciudad se parará a las 10 de la mañana durante unos minutos para recordar a las víctimas. #NanjingMassacre #南京 #82Aniversario #China https://t.co/wn5d9Xb9zu

1202572703783247872.full_text: 95-year-old Hu Xingjia, a survivor of the #NanjingMassacre passed away yesterday. There are now only 79 survivors left. https://t.co/dVWoUpVTjl

1198787285170286592.full_text: Many have forgotten their mistakes. But those who know it sincerely acknowledge their #japanesewarcriminals(#unit731, #nanjingmassacre, #PacificWar, #ComfortWomen). They also want freedom in #Tibet, #Uyghur and #HongKong.

1202025977385082881.full_text: Family members of the victims of #NanjingMassacre by Japanese invaders on Tuesday began a series of commemoration activities such as laying flowers and burning incense before the memorial wall in Nanjing, E China's Jiangsu. The Nanjing Massacre took place on Dec. 13, 1937. https://t.co/z7v1P0Qi2v

1202414789814820864.full_text: Another #NanjingMassacre survivor has passed away. Hu Xinjia died at the age of 95 on Wed, leaving only 79 registered survivors of the massacre. https://t.co/888aKxhVai

1201645733981626369.full_text: In a month, Nanjing will mark a very solemn anniversary. Understand the history of the #NanjingMassacre through a visit to the Nanjing Massacre Memorial Hall. https://t.co/wFrOGEOrpT https://t.co/uvAB6nCxB7

1202770462347939840.full_text: #RIP: Jin Maozhi, a survivor of the #NanjingMassacre, passed away at the age of 91 on Thursday afternoon, bringing the number of registered survivors of the massacre down to 78. https://t.co/j2R2DWHRBE
